Amusing, challenging, fun. Easily replayable many times over.
Cool game you should play it.

This absolute masterpiece of a game will have you on the edge of your seat throughout the whole campaign. You'll have the chance to build a solid friendship between P-body and Atlas while also stabilizing your real life friendship as well. You'll solve problems, laugh, cry, but most importantly; you will portal through the barren wasteland of the testing facilities with your best friend. You may develop some head trauma and even develop some brain aneurysms throughout the game but it will definitely take you on a journey from start to finish. 

10/10 would recommend.
best game ive played in a very long time
Very good game with awesome voice actors, mechanics, graphics and story. It also runs well on low end laptops and takes up very little space.

I always wanted to play this game as a kid, having known nothing about it aside from the fact that you play with portals. Now that I have played it (twice), I can safely say it is one of my all time favorite games and I recommend it as a game for anyone who hasn't played it before. 

P.S. GLaDOS could kill me and I'd thank her.

I've only played the Co-Op version of this game, but I can say it's honestly really good! I loved messing around with my partner in crime and we both had a lot of fun! Awesome story, a few tricky puzzles, and plenty of playtime! Overall a 10/10!
One of the greatest games ever made
amazing game, with good humour and  pretty good mechanics
One  of the best puzzle games ever

The original Portal was a fantastic game with clever puzzles, ingenious voice acting, extremely (!!!) funny writing and a subtle but intrigueing story,.
Portal 2 is like Portal 1. Dialed up to 11 in every category I mentioned before!
I can not remember when a computer game made me laugh uncontrollably like a lunatic. Poral 2 managed that several times.
This game is almost 10 years old and still blows 95% of all other modern games out of the water. It is a triumpf of game design and storytelling.
If you are a PC gamer and  don't have played this game, you should have your computer confiscated and your internet acccess revoked before you embarass yourself even more.
Play. This. Game.
